Title: Co lubia tygrysy
Actors: Krzysztof Kowalewski, Wojciech Pokora, Dorota Kaminska
Plot: Piotr is left by his wife and tries to kill himself, but his best friend Marek, convinced that only a new woman can bring back happiness to Piotr's life, saves him and persuades Piotr to go together to a summer resort.
